data.name: Apollo Active
data.description: An advanced online class management system that enables teachers to create and oversee scheduled sessions for remote teaching. The platform seamlessly handles time zone differences, sends session notifications via Slack webhooks, and generates detailed teacher schedule reports.

data.name: User Management System
data.description: This is just my hobby project, but I applied many skills I have learned to implement it (admin:1q2w3E*)

data.name: Apollo Ticket
data.description: An internal support system that empowers employees to create tickets for assistance from back-office personnel. The platform streamlines communication and issue resolution between various departments, fostering a more efficient and collaborative work environment.

data.name: Koffeeaddicted
data.description: Koffee Addicted is a introduction about web developer team, who have passion in technology and new challenger. Creating, maintaining and optimizing is the key values of the team.

data.name: SharkLien website
data.description: SharkLien is a personal website. Sharklien is used for introduce the lifestyle of individual, business ecosystem, charity activities and orientation to inspire the community.

data.name: Apollo ATS Portal
data.description: A user-friendly system enabling candidates to submit CVs and applications for employment. Designed the candidate database and implemented application tracking and custom notifications.

data.name: Apollo Survey
data.description: A versatile survey platform that enables administrators to create surveys for various purposes, primarily targeting parents. The system efficiently collects and stores survey responses in a secure database for analysis and decision-making.

data.name: Apollo Utility
data.description: An Accounting Department tool for comparing transaction details between the Apollo system and Vietcombank reports.

data.name: Integrate Payoo service into Apollo Payment system
data.description: The integration of the Payoo service into the Apollo payment system. This enhancement allowed users to seamlessly process payments using Payoo's secure and reliable payment gateway, ensuring a smooth payment experience.

data.name: DanDPak factory automation system
data.description: The development of a Factory Automation System, implementing software to ensure smooth and efficient automation flows within the factory environment. The system utilized various technologies, including APIs, sockets, and cron jobs, to optimize production processes and enhance overall factory operations.

data.name: VIMF Binh Duong 2023
data.description: Demonstrating Anthropic's factory automation platform at VIMF Binh Duong 2023. Showcasing capabilities in connectivity, workflows, analytics, and flexible automation for optimizing manufacturing operations.
